### Sadakane vs. Ohleb
```{r, echo=FALSE}
ds_ <- (rbind(read_ds('Nov2016/sada_protein_benchmark.csv', "sada"), 
              read_ds('Nov2016/ohleb_protein_benchmark.csv', "ohleb")) %>% 
          filter(measuring == "time"))

ds__ <- (cbind(ds_ %>% filter(unit == "runs", item == "alg") %>% 
         select(len_s, len_t, item, value, label),
       ds_ %>% filter(unit == "runs", item == "dstruct") %>% transmute(value1 = value),
       ds_ %>% filter(unit == "ms", item == "alg") %>% transmute(value2 = value),
       ds_ %>% filter(unit == "ms", item == "dstruct") %>% transmute(value3 = value)) %>% 
    mutate(val = value + value1 + value2 + value3))
  


ggplot(ds__, aes(as.factor(len_t), value, color=label)) + geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap(~len_s, scales = "free_y")


ds_ <- (rbind(read_ds('Nov2016/sada_protein_benchmark.csv', "sada"), 
              read_ds('Nov2016/ohleb_protein_benchmark.csv', "ohleb")) %>% 
          filter(measuring == "space", item %in% PEAK_SPACE_LAB))
ds_ %>% group_by(label) %>% summarise(value = sum(value) / 10^6)

ggplot(ds_, aes(prefix, value, color=label)) + geom_boxplot() + geom_point(aes(color=label)) + facet_wrap(~item, scales = "free_y")

```


### Lazy vs. non lazy
```{r, echo=FALSE}
ds_ <- (rbind(read_ds('Nov2016/lazy_protein_benchmark.csv', "lazy"), 
              read_ds('Nov2016/nonlazy_protein_benchmark.csv', "nonlazy")) %>% 
          filter(measuring == "time", unit=="ms"))


ggplot(ds_, aes(prefix, value, color=label)) + geom_boxplot() + geom_point(aes(color=label)) + facet_wrap(~item, scales = "free_y")

```
